title: 22 of the world's most creative alphabets
content:
Type is everywhere!

Check out a collection of alphabets gathered from artists, photographers, and design students from around the world on the [ReubenMiller blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121144751/http:/reubenmiller.typepad.com/my_weblog/2008/09/21-unexpected-a.html).

Here are a few of my favs:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121144751im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture10_4868.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121144751im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture11_5936.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121144751im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture12_4632.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121144751im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture13_5542.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121144751im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture14_6499.jpg)
author: Ngoc Ngo
